changeSet.sql: -- Create new listInstances to replace mistyped numnerInstances owned by ListDescriptors INSERT INTO listinstance SELECT vi.variableinstance_id FROM variableinstance AS vi LEFT JOIN abstractscope AS scope ON (vi.playerscope_id = scope.id OR vi.teamscope_id = scope.id OR vi.gamescope_id = scope.id OR scope.variableinstance_variableinstance_id = vi.variableinstance_id ) LEFT JOIN variabledescriptor AS vd ON (vd.variabledescriptor_id = scope.variabledescriptor_variabledescriptor_id OR vd.defaultinstance_variableinstance_id = vi.variableinstance_id) WHERE vi.dtype = 'NumberInstance' AND vd.dtype = 'ListDescriptor';

-- Update link from variableinstance to listinstance UPDATE variableinstance AS vi SET dtype = 'ListInstance' FROM ( SELECT vi.variableinstance_id FROM variableinstance AS vi LEFT JOIN abstractscope AS scope ON (vi.playerscope_id = scope.id OR vi.teamscope_id = scope.id OR vi.gamescope_id = scope.id OR scope.variableinstance_variableinstance_id = vi.variableinstance_id ) LEFT JOIN variabledescriptor AS vd ON (vd.variabledescriptor_id = scope.variabledescriptor_variabledescriptor_id OR vd.defaultinstance_variableinstance_id = vi.variableinstance_id) WHERE vi.dtype = 'NumberInstance' AND vd.dtype = 'ListDescriptor') AS FOO WHERE vi.variableinstance_id = FOO.variableinstance_id;
